@package language-thrift
@version 0.2.0.0

module Language.Thrift.Types
data Program srcAnnot
Program :: [Header] -> [Definition srcAnnot] -> Program srcAnnot
programHeaders :: Program srcAnnot -> [Header]
programDefinitions :: Program srcAnnot -> [Definition srcAnnot]
data Header
Include :: Text -> Header
includePath :: Header -> Text
Namespace :: Text -> Text -> Header
namespaceLanguage :: Header -> Text
namespaceName :: Header -> Text
data Definition srcAnnot
ConstDefinition :: FieldType -> Text -> ConstValue -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Definition srcAnnot
constType :: Definition srcAnnot -> FieldType
constName :: Definition srcAnnot -> Text
constValue :: Definition srcAnnot -> ConstValue
constDocstring :: Definition srcAnnot -> Docstring
constSrcAnnot :: Definition srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
TypeDefinition :: Type srcAnnot -> [TypeAnnotation] -> Definition srcAnnot
typeDefinition :: Definition srcAnnot -> Type srcAnnot
typeAnnotations :: Definition srcAnnot -> [TypeAnnotation]
ServiceDefinition :: Text -> Maybe Text -> [Function srcAnnot] -> [TypeAnnotation] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Definition srcAnnot
serviceName :: Definition srcAnnot -> Text
serviceExtends :: Definition srcAnnot -> Maybe Text
serviceFunctions :: Definition srcAnnot -> [Function srcAnnot]
serviceAnnotations :: Definition srcAnnot -> [TypeAnnotation]
serviceDocstring :: Definition srcAnnot -> Docstring
serviceSrcAnnot :: Definition srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
data Type srcAnnot
Typedef :: FieldType -> Text -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Type srcAnnot
typedefType :: Type srcAnnot -> FieldType
typedefName :: Type srcAnnot -> Text
typedefDocstring :: Type srcAnnot -> Docstring
typedefSrcAnnot :: Type srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
Enum :: Text -> [EnumDef srcAnnot] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Type srcAnnot
enumName :: Type srcAnnot -> Text
enumValues :: Type srcAnnot -> [EnumDef srcAnnot]
enumDocstring :: Type srcAnnot -> Docstring
enumSrcAnnot :: Type srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
Struct :: Text -> [Field srcAnnot] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Type srcAnnot
structName :: Type srcAnnot -> Text
structFields :: Type srcAnnot -> [Field srcAnnot]
structDocstring :: Type srcAnnot -> Docstring
structSrcAnnot :: Type srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
Union :: Text -> [Field srcAnnot] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Type srcAnnot
unionName :: Type srcAnnot -> Text
unionFields :: Type srcAnnot -> [Field srcAnnot]
unionDocstring :: Type srcAnnot -> Docstring
unionSrcAnnot :: Type srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
Exception :: Text -> [Field srcAnnot] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Type srcAnnot
exceptionName :: Type srcAnnot -> Text
exceptionFields :: Type srcAnnot -> [Field srcAnnot]
exceptionDocstring :: Type srcAnnot -> Docstring
exceptionSrcAnnot :: Type srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
Senum :: Text -> [Text] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Type srcAnnot
senumName :: Type srcAnnot -> Text
senumValues :: Type srcAnnot -> [Text]
senumDocstring :: Type srcAnnot -> Docstring
senumSrcAnnot :: Type srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
data FieldRequiredness
Required :: FieldRequiredness
Optional :: FieldRequiredness
data Field srcAnnot
Field :: Maybe Integer -> Maybe FieldRequiredness -> FieldType -> Text -> Maybe ConstValue -> [TypeAnnotation] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Field srcAnnot
fieldIdentifier :: Field srcAnnot -> Maybe Integer
fieldRequiredNess :: Field srcAnnot -> Maybe FieldRequiredness
fieldType :: Field srcAnnot -> FieldType
fieldName :: Field srcAnnot -> Text
fieldDefault :: Field srcAnnot -> Maybe ConstValue
fieldAnnotations :: Field srcAnnot -> [TypeAnnotation]
fieldDocstring :: Field srcAnnot -> Docstring
fieldSrcAnnot :: Field srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
data EnumDef srcAnnot
EnumDef :: Text -> Maybe Integer -> [TypeAnnotation] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> EnumDef srcAnnot
enumDefName :: EnumDef srcAnnot -> Text
enumDefValue :: EnumDef srcAnnot -> Maybe Integer
enumDefAnnotations :: EnumDef srcAnnot -> [TypeAnnotation]
enumDefDocstring :: EnumDef srcAnnot -> Docstring
enumDefSrcAnnot :: EnumDef srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
data ConstValue
ConstInt :: Integer -> ConstValue
ConstFloat :: Double -> ConstValue
ConstLiteral :: Text -> ConstValue
ConstIdentifier :: Text -> ConstValue
ConstList :: [ConstValue] -> ConstValue
ConstMap :: [(ConstValue, ConstValue)] -> ConstValue
data FieldType
DefinedType :: Text -> FieldType
StringType :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
BinaryType :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
SListType :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
BoolType :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
ByteType :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
I16Type :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
I32Type :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
I64Type :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
DoubleType :: [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
MapType :: FieldType -> FieldType -> [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
SetType :: FieldType -> [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
ListType :: FieldType -> [TypeAnnotation] -> FieldType
data Function srcAnnot
Function :: Bool -> Maybe FieldType -> Text -> [Field srcAnnot] -> Maybe [Field srcAnnot] -> [TypeAnnotation] -> Docstring -> srcAnnot -> Function srcAnnot
functionOneWay :: Function srcAnnot -> Bool
functionReturnType :: Function srcAnnot -> Maybe FieldType
functionName :: Function srcAnnot -> Text
functionParameters :: Function srcAnnot -> [Field srcAnnot]
functionExceptions :: Function srcAnnot -> Maybe [Field srcAnnot]
functionAnnotations :: Function srcAnnot -> [TypeAnnotation]
functionDocstring :: Function srcAnnot -> Docstring
functionSrcAnnot :: Function srcAnnot -> srcAnnot
data TypeAnnotation
TypeAnnotation :: Text -> Text -> TypeAnnotation
typeAnnotationName :: TypeAnnotation -> Text
typeAnnotationValue :: TypeAnnotation -> Text
type Docstring = Maybe Text
instance Typeable Header
instance Typeable FieldRequiredness
instance Typeable ConstValue
instance Typeable TypeAnnotation
instance Typeable FieldType
instance Typeable EnumDef
instance Typeable Field
instance Typeable Function
instance Typeable Type
instance Typeable Definition
instance Typeable Program
instance Show Header
instance Ord Header
instance Eq Header
instance Data Header
instance Generic Header
instance Show FieldRequiredness
instance Ord FieldRequiredness
instance Eq FieldRequiredness
instance Data FieldRequiredness
instance Generic FieldRequiredness
instance Show ConstValue
instance Ord ConstValue
instance Eq ConstValue
instance Data ConstValue
instance Generic ConstValue
instance Show TypeAnnotation
instance Ord TypeAnnotation
instance Eq TypeAnnotation
instance Data TypeAnnotation
instance Generic TypeAnnotation
instance Show FieldType
instance Ord FieldType
instance Eq FieldType
instance Data FieldType
instance Generic FieldType
instance Show srcAnnot => Show (EnumDef srcAnnot)
instance Ord srcAnnot => Ord (EnumDef srcAnnot)
instance Eq srcAnnot => Eq (EnumDef srcAnnot)
instance Data srcAnnot => Data (EnumDef srcAnnot)

instance Show srcAnnot => Show (Function srcAnnot)
instance Ord srcAnnot => Ord (Function srcAnnot)

instance Data srcAnnot => Data (Function srcAnnot)
instance Generic (Function srcAnnot)
instance Show srcAnnot => Show (Type srcAnnot)
instance Ord srcAnnot => Ord (Type srcAnnot)
instance Eq srcAnnot => Eq (Type srcAnnot)
instance Data srcAnnot => Data (Type srcAnnot)
instance Generic (Type srcAnnot)
instance Show srcAnnot => Show (Definition srcAnnot)
instance Ord srcAnnot => Ord (Definition srcAnnot)
instance Eq srcAnnot => Eq (Definition srcAnnot)
instance Data srcAnnot => Data (Definition srcAnnot)
instance Generic (Definition srcAnnot)
instance Show srcAnnot => Show (Program srcAnnot)
instance Ord srcAnnot => Ord (Program srcAnnot)
instance Eq srcAnnot => Eq (Program srcAnnot)
instance Data srcAnnot => Data (Program srcAnnot)
instance Generic (Program srcAnnot)
instance Datatype D1Header
instance Constructor C1_0Header
instance Constructor C1_1Header
instance Selector S1_0_0Header
instance Selector S1_1_0Header
instance Selector S1_1_1Header
instance Datatype D1FieldRequiredness

instance Datatype D1ConstValue

module Language.Thrift.Parser
data ThriftParser a
runThriftParser :: ThriftParser a -> Parser a
program :: ThriftParser (Program Delta)
header :: ThriftParser Header
definition :: ThriftParser (Definition Delta)
typeDefinition :: ThriftParser (Definition Delta)
typedef :: ThriftParser (Type Delta)
enum :: ThriftParser (Type Delta)
enumDef :: ThriftParser (EnumDef Delta)
senum :: ThriftParser (Type Delta)
struct :: ThriftParser (Type Delta)
union :: ThriftParser (Type Delta)
exception :: ThriftParser (Type Delta)
fieldRequiredness :: ThriftParser FieldRequiredness
fieldType :: ThriftParser FieldType
field :: ThriftParser (Field Delta)
constant :: ThriftParser (Definition Delta)
constantValue :: ThriftParser ConstValue
service :: ThriftParser (Definition Delta)
function :: ThriftParser (Function Delta)
typeAnnotations :: ThriftParser [TypeAnnotation]
instance Show ParserState
instance Ord ParserState
instance Eq ParserState
instance Functor ThriftParser
instance Applicative ThriftParser
instance Alternative ThriftParser
instance Monad ThriftParser
instance MonadPlus ThriftParser
instance Parsing ThriftParser
instance CharParsing ThriftParser
instance DeltaParsing ThriftParser
instance TokenParsing ThriftParser
